pickaxes.name: Stone Pickaxe
pickaxes.description: A basic pickaxe for standard mining. Good for beginners.

pickaxes.name: Iron Pickaxe
pickaxes.description: Mines blocks 50% faster than the Stone Pickaxe.

pickaxes.name: Steel Drill
pickaxes.description: A powerful drill that mines blocks three times faster than the Stone Pickaxe.

pickaxes.name: Diamond Pickaxe
pickaxes.description: A high-tech pickaxe that excels at breaking tougher blocks in deeper zones.

pickaxes.name: Quantum Drill
pickaxes.description: The ultimate mining tool, shredding even the hardest blocks in the deepest zones.
